Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CZS-16 (Cruzioseptin-16, natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1c; XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: the splendid leaf frog,Cruziohyla calcarifer, Central and South America

Literature.Author: Cuesta SA, Reinoso C, Morales F, Pilaquinga F, Morán-Marcillo G, Proaño-Bolaños C, Blasco-Zúñiga A, Rivera M, Meneses L.2021
Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial cruzioseptin peptides extracted from the splendid leaf frog, Cruziohyla calcarifer

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (87%) toCZS-2Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 27.5 uM), S. aureus (MIC 27.5 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 55 uM).Parasites: T. cruzi Trypomastigotes (IC50 18.7 uM) or Amastigotes (IC50 38.33 uM), P. falciparum NF54 (IC50 36.82 uM) or TM90C2B (IC50 34.41 uM), L. Mexicana (IC50 6.46 uM) (Proaño-Bolaños et al., 2024.Reg. 7/2021; updated 7/2024
